neocognitron

Class NeocognitronTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • neocognitron.NeocognitronTrainer

  • public class NeocognitronTrainer
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a helper class which is used to train a Neocognitron. By using ArrayLists of inputs, a neocognitron can be trained and verified. This also contains the methods for determining the error rate of the network.
    Author:
    Nicholas J. Conn

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NeocognitronTrainer(java.util.ArrayList<double[][]> i, java.util.ArrayList<double[][]> t, java.io.File outFile)
      Initialize the neocognitron trainer with a set of input files, training files, and the output file for the best neocognitron

    • Constructor Detail

      • NeocognitronTrainer

        public NeocognitronTrainer(java.util.ArrayList<double[][]> i,
                   java.util.ArrayList<double[][]> t,
                   java.io.File outFile)
        Initialize the neocognitron trainer with a set of input files, training files, and the output file for the best neocognitron
        Parameters:
        i - Input images for training
        t - Input images used for verification
        outFile - File where the Neocognitron is saved

    • Method Detail

      • runTrainingSet

        public Neocognitron runTrainingSet(int loops)
        Train the neocognitron using a specific number of loops. Using a specific training set of images.
        Parameters:
        loops - Number of times each image is presented to the network
        Returns:
        The trained neocognitron

      • verifyTraining

        public boolean verifyTraining(Neocognitron n)
        Determine if training was successful. The neocognitron fails when two characters return the same result, or if there is no output for any character.
        Parameters:
        n - Neocognitron to be verified
        Returns:
        true if verified, false if not verified

      • getNeocognitron

        public Neocognitron getNeocognitron(int trainingLoops)
        Get the final neocognitron. Training it with a specific number of loops. The method does not return a neocognitron until training has been successful.
        Parameters:
        trainingLoops - Loops used during training.
        Returns:
        Resulting Neocognitron.

      • verifyNeocognitron

        public double verifyNeocognitron(Neocognitron n)
        Calculate the error rate of a specific neocognitron.
        Parameters:
        n - The neocognitron under test.
        Returns:
        The resulting error rate.

      • verifyNeocognitron

        public double verifyNeocognitron(Neocognitron n,
                        java.util.ArrayList<double[][]> t)
        Calculate the error rate of a specific neocognitron using a specific list of inputs.
        Parameters:
        n - The neocognitron under test
        t - The list of files used to verify the network
        Returns:
        The resulting error rate
